game.name: Vampire Instinct
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Survive as long as you can as a thirsty vampire. Will you hide your kills to avoid the guards? Cause panic in the middle of a crowd? Graze on your victims, turning them into cursed killing machines? Vampire Instinct features an infinite world of procedurally generated towns and townsfolk to eat.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive as long as you can as a thirsty vampire. Will you hide your kills to avoid the guards? Cause panic in the middle of a crowd? Graze on your victims, turning them into cursed killing machines? Vampire Instinct features an infinite world of procedurally generated towns and townsfolk to eat.
